mapper.select: select prod_id, to_char(date_showday, 'yy/mm/dd') || ' ' || to_char(date_showday, 'day') as date_showday, date_showtime from yes_show_date where prod_id = #{showNum} order by date_showday, date_showtime
select distinct to_char(date_showday, 'yy/mm/dd') || ' ' || to_char(date_showday, 'day') as date_showday from yes_show_date where prod_id = #{showNum} order by date_showday
